I'm somewhat confused tho why the translator changed the title. Maybe its connected to the song they mentioned. The Japanese title means "I wish time would stop" and is a double meaning referencing making it easier to rape the girl and also referencing how pedophilia becomes more stressful the older you get from your preferred age. It becomes the living embodiament of your desire to be young again, because it was the last time you were normal.

The Author really touched the problems that were/are and will still persists and keeping on happening because of the "selective blindness and deafened" of the majority of people (who are just normal people without a voice or authority to be heard) and those with the voices and/or authority to do some real works just simply don't care because... @ThiccChristmasCakeEnjoyer Man, as if reeedit was a place full of wisdom. I have consumed lolicon for many years (like idk, 25?) and my life is the most normal thing in the world. It is just a fetish. The same as when you have fun playing an FPS or a fighting game, or watch a shitty horror movie. No one goes out to shoot/punch people down the street or stab their friends for that, unless he has a previous mental illness. It is only a entertainment to hang out. And just for you to know, those who attack lolicon in the most hardcore way (like the whiteknights from social media), are the most likely to be pedophiles in real life.

@ThiccChristmasCakeEnjoyer I agree that loli, and it’s mere presence on pages like this and beyond, do likely have an effect on pedophilia. Imagine you’re a kid discovering porn, through hentai, for the first time and it’s loli porn, or even shota porn while we’re on the topic. You’d grow to believe this is just how it is, it will be much easier to normalize within your own subconscious, and studies have shown that fetishes can have an influence over personality and action. I really like what the translator pointed out, that this is what loli porn is in a more true to life state, violent, brutal, traumatizing, and most of all, inhumanizing. Porn is a sexual fantasy played out in a somewhat controlled environment, but this is what those fantasies are in real life, something despicable to even the worst of people.

I believe on pages 14-15, it shows how the protagonist developed his lolicon habits. It's been found that sexual attraction to children usually begins in childhood and that childhood attraction simply never goes away. We are shown the boy walking alongside a young girl, as well as a tiny sprout by his feet. As the boy ages, he begins to lose interest in the girl as she no longer resembles the little girl he fell in love with, and the tiny sprout is now a series of vines trapping him in his lust for that young girl (and others like her) until we eventually see his hunched over body raping the little girl. As evident by the first page (as well as pg 15), the MC knows what he feels is wrong, and in his own words "I envied people who could be born with the right inclinations." giving the reader just a tiny glimpse into the mind of a pedophile.
